title: Gentleman Ivern

embed.description: Saw some jokes about a gentleman skin for Ivern and figured I'd give concepting the skin a shot, enjoy! Gentleman Ivern Skin Concept

body: The idea for this skin had been floating around for a while after Ivern was revealed, so I decided to concept it this last week.

replies.body: Oh my gosh, even the particles have top hats :D I love that Daisy has a philo stone necklace, very cool concept!
Thanks! It was a ton of fun playing around the 'gentleman' theme and despite a couple of bumps with Brushmaker and Daisy!, it worked out in the end. :)
I love how you made Daisy a lady <3
Thank you! Ivern needed an equally classy companion for a night on the rift and who better to cruse down midlane with than the lovely Ms. Daisy?
I love it. But I might still like Candy King Ivern more. Might have to get both to really tell... Damn you.
